text: At Johnson & Johnson, we are
harnessing the power of science
and technology to prevent,
treat and cure complex diseases.

AWS is our strategic
cloud and Gen AI partner.

In 2019, we have set an
ambitious target to move 50%

of our workload into the
public cloud by 2025.

At this point in time,
we have surpassed that

and most of our workload
is now running on AWS.
We have also worked very closely

with our partners in
creating a very secure Gen AI

environment, whereby it allows
our users to experiment
and to pilot with agility

and help us innovate at
speed. Security, performance,

and global presence play a
key part in us selecting AWS
as a strategic partner. AWS's broad range
of services provides us with the ability

to leverage the advanced
capabilities in AI

and machine learning to run
a lot of our data science
as well as Gen AI efforts.

The security and compliance
is another big factor.
AWS brings together expertise

with our very talented
employees, co-create many
of the solutions that today are driving
value for the organization.

Looking ahead in 2025,
we are going to be working

with a business to advance
personalized medicine,

accelerate drug discovery,
surgical innovation, as well

as create efficiencies
across the organization.
